name: Finish Line
description: Moll lays the blame for L'ak's death at the crew of the Discovery's feet and believes the only way to spare her future self in this timeline is by destroying all iterations of the Discovery, regardless of the consequences! Stop her!
rules:
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- In a Voyage Event, you will engage in Voyages with ocassional Voyage Encounters that will test proficiencies of your voyage crew.
-- Voyage Encounters take place at the following points in time: 1 minute, 5 minutes, 15 minutes, 30 minutes, 45 minutes, 1 hour, 1.5 hours, 2 hours, and every 2 hours after that.
-- Passing a Voyage Encounter without losing any contests raises the multiplier for Victory Points gained in contests. Losing a contest resets this multiplier.
-- Three of the following traits are randomly chosen for each Encounter: Inspiring, Explorer, Scoundrel, Casual, Playful, Hero, Marksman, Investigator. Using crew with matching traits increases their Crit Chance in contests.
-- Using Moll, any version of Ruhn, L'ak, Airiam, or Discovery crew will provide a bonus to antimatter and a permanent multiplier to passively gained Victory Points.
-- Using the U.S.S. Discovery, the Booker's Ship, the Constitution Class Ship, or ships with the Federation trait will provide a bonus to antimatter.
-- Earn Event Victory Points passively by running a voyage, and actively by winning contests during Voyage Encounters. The amount you earn increases with every Voyage Encounter passed. 
-- Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Bonus: Federation (Ship trait), Moll, Ruhn, L'ak, Airiam, or Discovery

featured_crew.name: Mariner
featured_crew.flavor: Of all the holoprograms on the Cerritos, why did Boimler have to fire up this one? Mariner finds Dixon Hill to be an old man’s program.

action.name: Come On, Boims, Let's Do Something Fun!

featured_crew.name: L'ak
featured_crew.flavor: In love with Moll, L’ak ran away from his family and then went with Moll in search of the Progenitor technology.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Mariner
rewards.flavor: Of all the holoprograms on the Cerritos, why did Boimler have to fire up this one? Mariner finds Dixon Hill to be an old man’s program.

action.name: Come On, Boims, Let's Do Something Fun!

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

screens.text: "I warned you all to stay out of my way. I have my target in my sight. As far as the people from this time should be concerned, Discovery was destroyed a century ago. So let it go. Leave Discovery in the past!"
"You know we can't do that, Moll. Why do you want Discovery? Discovery can't bring back L'ak. It can't clear an erigah or seat you on the throne of the Breen. So what is it you want?"

"Still trying to play father to me just because you use his name? Imposter. If Discovery never reaches the future, my L'ak will live. You should forget about the Discovery and her crew. I will wipe every version of them from existence. And anyone who tries to stop me."
"I believe she means her threats, Captain. I would understand if you wanted nothing to do with Discovery for the safety of your crew. But we will not back down. And I hope you will stand with us."

"I warned you all to stay out of my way. I have my target in my sight. As far as the people from this time should be concerned, Discovery was destroyed a century ago. So let it go. Leave Discovery in the past!"
"You know we can't do that, Moll. Why do you want Discovery? Discovery can't bring back L'ak. It can't clear an erigah or seat you on the throne of the Breen. So what is it you want?"

"Still trying to play father to me just because you use his name? Imposter. If Discovery never reaches the future, my L'ak will live. You should forget about the Discovery and her crew. I will wipe every version of them from existence. And anyone who tries to stop me."
"I believe she means her threats, Captain. I would understand if you wanted nothing to do with Discovery for the safety of your crew. But we will not back down. And I hope you will stand with us."
